DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Clinical Trial Investigate Effect Pharmacokinetics YH14755 Compared Co-administration Rosuvastatin Metformin SR Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male female body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 25 kg/m2 2. Who suffer clinically significant disease 3 . Provision sign write informed consent 1 . History clinically significant disease 2 . A history drug abuse presence positive reaction drug abuse potential urine screening drug . 3 . Administration investigational product within 3 month prior first dose . 4 . Administration herbal medicine within 4 week administration ethical drug within 2 week administration overthecounter ( OTC ) drug within 1 week prior first dose investigational product ( investigator ( study doctor ) determine person meet criteria appropriately , relevant person may participate study ) . 5 . Volunteers consider eligible clinical trial investigator ( study doctor ) due reason include laboratory test result , ECGs , vital sign .
